comment: Took him online and he graded easy and was nice !!! Love him

I love Dr. King. He's so funny and nice and will answer any question you have super fast. He is not like some professors in the department who I am scared to talk to because they talk down to you. He genuinely wants you to learn and do well in his class. I always take him when I see his name.

Dr. King is great and I wish I could take him for more courses. I took an online Summer semester with him and his schedule and expectations were super clear. The syllabus was exactly what you needed, the schedule was easy to follow, and the assignments were well weighted. 5 quizzes (just short essays you have a few days to complete) and 3 projects

What an amazing professor. Ive taken him a few times. His lectures get boring but if you pay attention and read you will pass. Hes very understanding, and wants to help. Dont skip because his PowerPoints are hard to understand. They dont have a lot of information. One of my favorite professors.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: What an awesome professor.  Read the book before class in order to understand the material and ask questions so the class is not bore. He is funny and very understanding. Many people drop his class becuse they think that his paper are to hard. Before you thing of drapping class talk to him. You will get good grade is you finish.

King is a great teacher. He has a dry sense of humor that not many people get but I enjoyed it. He legitimately wants to help his students understand the material and learn. He is very responsive and very understanding. He's a very nice man but his class can be kind of boring due to the power point. It's overall a very easy and enjoyable class.
great instructor and great guy. He helped me through unfortunate issues I had aside from class and kept my head in the game. I need to thank him.

This was my 2nd time taking Dr. King and I enjoy his class. His dry sense of humor is hilarious. Can be a bit challenging to listen to his lectures due to his monotone voice but all assignments and tests are fair and straight forward, and he's very helpful.
attendance is counted.. class is easy but very challenging to sit through. he is very very very dry and repetitive..
